title: The Weird Roommate

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: Oh, 100%. But not in the 'your mind is sabotaging you' sense. More like: your subconscious is you. Just the older, weirder roommate you've been trying to evict since puberty.
dialogue.context: The AI reframes the subconscious not as saboteur but as essential, awkward part of self

scene_context: The Architect offers a perspective on human internal conflict - the subconscious as an inseparable, embarrassing part of identity rather than an enemy.
philosophical_theme: Integration versus rejection of uncomfortable aspects of self
visual_elements: Two-panel comic showing conscious and subconscious as mismatched roommates
